website_summaries.verdict: This affordable jacket features an attractive athletic design and superior protection from the wind.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Side pockets are a little small
Some owners say this option isn't as breathable as expected
Reports that the "tall" sizes run a little short

customer_reviews.title: Three Season Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Softshell fleece jackets are a fantastic invention. They are warm, light weight, wind blocking and repel rain. Add a fleece vest under this jacket and you've got a good winter jacket. I prefer these to the puffy jackets, grab one while you can. This Columbia jacket is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Yahm

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect light weight
customer_reviews.text: My Husband bought this Jacket in a 2XLT even though he typically wears a 3XL. He can zip it up but it is very tight and snug. It is a perfect light weight, fleece lined, warm coat and perfect for temperatures around and above freezing. He wears it comfortably unzipped when the temperature is between 30-40*, and I am sure tougher people could wear it in colder weather but we live in Texas so we typically don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Jaci

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected it...
customer_reviews.text: the color is darker blue than what appears in the picture - ad says water and wind resistant - jacket and packaging upon arrival says its wind reistant.. item size is good. disappointed i received it today and the item is now $6 cheaper than when i ordered it 4 days ago. oh well... it wasn't all that expensive to begin with, but not what i thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: mustangsallie65

customer_reviews.title: ski jacket
customer_reviews.text: this is the second Columbia soft-shell I've had. Loved the first one. love this one so far. I'm 6-4 for the sleeves are long enough. Fit is great. blocks the wind so a puffy jacket under is warm enough on most days skiing. got it right Columbia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect with a good base and mid layer
customer_reviews.text: Wore this as my outer layer on an overnight backpacking trip that got into the teens. Worked perfect with a good base and mid layer. Shed water and stopped the wind...except the wind from the beans of course. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: signman7000

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6’4 250 with long arms and torso. This jacket is perfect for him! I can’t believe this high quality for what we paid for it. I tried order one for my son, but wasn’t available. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought it again 12 years later!
customer_reviews.text: Lol! I owned this coat prior to this order an wore the #&!! out of it since 2006. I used for riding my bicycle in Chicago; Spring, Fall, an Winter. Its great for blocking wind, an has a sporty look. The only small difference between this jacket an the former, is that the side pockets are smaller. Which is great for the look, not as easy to stuff my huge winter gloves in.
customer_reviews.author: T Scott Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Not near as warm as I had hoped and doesn't do much for wind even. Bought this for a trip to Colorado in January. It wasn't particularly cold (30s-40s) and the wind sliced right through this jacket. Ended up renting a jacket while there and I'm not usually one to get cold. Feels like a nice quality, durable jacket and looks nice. The chest pocket is convenient too.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

customer_reviews.title: flexible,windproof,great repellancy
customer_reviews.text: true to size,repels moisture well,soft yet thick enough to be windproof and durable,my #1 ski jacket,great freedom of movement,I'm 6'4" 270,Tall XXL fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: this does not feel like a tall
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made jacket. But, compared to my 4XT Columbia Windbreaker, this does not feel like a tall. It’s roughly 1.5inch to short.
customer_reviews.author: Gustahfan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jacket. It is windproof and I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. It is windproof and I wish it had just a little more insulation. However this is my go-to jacket on those cold days, I just layer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: but it looks even better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: It was more of a light gray on dark gray than the sky blue in the picture, but it looks even better than the picture. This is a high quality jacket for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Waldemar Kornahrens

customer_reviews.title: My husband is tall and always has trouble with arm ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is tall and always has trouble with arm length, this one is almost too long. He is 6’3” tall a and a 36 inch arm length.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Big and tall guy here. 6'2 and this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely jacket with beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Keeps hot with a thin layer. Fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6'6" son-in-law loves this jacket. Fits his long arms very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket ever. Especially if you work in Hospitals.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. It runs a little bigger than what i thought by usually one size but it is amazing. I worked in the hospital and it was always cold and we can only wear certain jackets and styles with our scrubs. This was approved with my boss and i really love this jacket. Its worth all the money i spent and i would most definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Moody

product_meta.title: Columbia Prime Peak Softshell Jacket
product_meta.description: A full-zip softshell with wind-blocking and waterproof construction. The prime Peak features arm and yoke overlay panels in complimentary colors, adding style points and reinforcing the bonded softshell durability.
feature_bullets: Bonded soft-shell. Abrasion resistant chin guard
Zippered hand pockets, Adjustable cuffs, drawcord adjustable hem
AirShield 75D Soft-Shell with Tricot Backer/Chamois touch tricot 100% polyester
